content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Setup at position(x=8.5, y=13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(x=8.5, y=13.5)
- Iron gear input system:
  - Wooden chest at position(x=8.5, y=10.5)
  - Burner inserter at position(x=8.5, y=11.5)
- Copper plate input system:
  - Wooden chest at position(x=6.5, y=14.5)
  - Burner inserter at position(x=6.5, y=13.5)
- Output system:
  - Wooden chest at position(x=11.5, y=13.5)
  - Burner inserter at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
- Power pole at position(x=8.5, y=17.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation Setup
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at position(x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler at position(x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Pipe network connecting water and steam
- Electric pole network for power distribution

### Mining and Smelting Operations
Multiple mining and smelting setups at various locations:
1. Setup at x=41, y=-82:
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest at position(x=41.5, y=-80.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-79.5)

2. Setup at x=-28, y=-61:
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest at position(x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=-26.5, y=-59.5)
   - Stone furnace at position(x=-25.0, y=-59.0)
   - Output chest at position(x=-22.5, y=-58.5)
   - Output inserter at position(x=-23.5, y=-58.5)

3. Setup at x=-18, y=-53:
   - Burner mining drill
   - Wooden chest at position(x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
   - Burner inserter at position(x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
   - Stone furnace at position(x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
   - Output chest at position(x=-12.5, y=-50.5)
   - Output inserter at position(x=-13.5, y=-50.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- When placing entities next to existing structures, ensure there is enough space and no conflicting entities
- Increase spacing parameter when placing entities if initial placement fails
- Consider alternative directions or reference positions if default placement is blocked

### Power Network Issues
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to form a complete network
- Place power poles within reach of each other and powered entities
- Verify power generation is working before expecting powered entities to function

### Production Line Setup
- Verify all components of production chains have power and required resources
- Ensure proper connections between input/output systems
- Check that inserters are properly oriented for picking up and dropping items

### Resource Management
- Cannot craft copper plates directly - must use furnace
- Ensure sufficient fuel in burner-powered entities
- Verify resource availability before attempting crafting operations
